item1:
库存数据的查询
Inquiry of inventory data
item2:
可查询产品在哪个库位及产品明细数据
You can check the location and the details of the article
item4:
货物已入库
Article have been stored
item5:
库存信息的查询条件
Search conditions for inventory information
item7:
如果无符合条件的库存数据，系统将提示查无此库存信息
If there is no eligible inventory data, the system will prompt that there is no such inventory information
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选article No后点选Query查询库存数据
Enter query conditions or select article No and click Query to query inventory data
